value.serviceSlug: Expert cleaning for your home and office spaces.
value.serviceText: Hutchison Maintenance provides top-notch home and office cleaning services, ensuring a clean and healthy environment for you and your loved ones. Our experienced team takes care of every detail, leaving your space spotless and refreshed.

features.name: Customized Cleaning Plans
features.description: We offer tailored cleaning plans to suit your specific needs and preferences, ensuring a personalized experience.

features.name: Trustworthy Team
features.description: Our team of professionals is reliable, efficient, and meticulous, ensuring the highest quality of service.

features.name: Flexible Scheduling
features.description: We accommodate your schedule and provide cleaning services at a time that works best for you.

value.serviceSlug: Impress potential buyers with pristine property presentation.
value.serviceText: Hutchison Maintenance offers real estate cleaning services to make properties look their best for potential buyers or tenants. Our attention to detail and commitment to excellence ensures that your property will stand out in the competitive real estate market.

features.name: Pre-Listing Cleaning
features.description: We provide thorough cleaning services before listing your property, ensuring it looks its best for potential buyers.

features.name: Post-Construction Cleaning
features.description: Our team takes care of post-construction cleaning, making your newly built or renovated property shine.

features.name: Move-In/Move-Out Cleaning
features.description: We offer move-in and move-out cleaning services to ensure a smooth transition for both property owners and tenants.

value.serviceSlug: Showcase your construction project with a spotless finish.
value.serviceText: Hutchison Maintenance provides post-construction cleaning services to make your newly built or renovated property look its absolute best. Our team of professionals ensures that every detail is taken care of, leaving your project spotless and ready for occupancy.

features.name: Debris Removal
features.description: We take care of debris removal, ensuring a clean and safe environment for your property.

features.name: Detailed Cleaning
features.description: Our team provides thorough cleaning services, covering every corner and surface of your property.

features.name: Final Touches
features.description: We add the final touches to your project, making it look polished and ready for occupancy.

value.serviceSlug: Maintain a clean and productive workspace.
value.serviceText: Hutchison Maintenance offers office cleaning services to keep your workplace looking its best. A clean and organized environment promotes productivity and employee satisfaction. Our team of professionals ensures that your office space is well-maintained and spotless.

features.name: Regular Cleaning
features.description: We provide regular cleaning services to maintain a clean and organized office environment.

features.name: Customized Plans
features.description: Our team works with you to create a customized cleaning plan that suits your office's specific needs.

features.name: High-Quality Service
features.description: We are committed to providing high-quality service, ensuring your office space is always looking its best.

services.instructions: Write up to four services in a way that mimics the example schema

example.serviceBlurb: A short blurb about what the service is. Should be catchy and short.
example.serviceSlug: A slightly longer description of the service, but no more than 1 sentence.
example.serviceText: A more thorough description of the service. 1 paragraph.
example.imageUrl: A url to an image that represents the service a 1:1 aspect ratio
example.imageAlt: Alt text for the image. can be left blank

features.name: A 1st specific feature of the service
features.description: A 1 paragraph description of the service

features.name: A 2nd specific feature of the service
features.description: A 1 paragraph description of the service.

features.name: A 3rd specific feature of the service
features.description: A 1 paragraph description of the service.
